game.name: Death Race
game.description:
This racing is going to be the biggest event of your life! Are you ready to accept this challenge and put all your driving and hand-eye coordination skills to test? Join Death Race game and get ready to become a driving champion who gains popularity throughout the world! Your objective in this brand new car racing game is to smash the other drivers and guide yourself towards the path of victory. 

You need to be very careful while exploring this battle royale racing game. Begin your game with the selection of a car and map as well. Once you are done, click the Ready button and be prepared yourself to dive into the matchless driving fun. Control your vehicle perfectly and also keep your eyes on your rivals in order to avoid your car being wrecked! Do your best and try to earn the maximum points to ensure your win!
When the game is over, you can also feel free to share your final score on your preferred social media platforms. No need to worry if you fail in the initial attempts since you can try it out in your device again and again! All the best to check out more car driving games for Kids on our website to have fun to the greatest level! Good luck friends to have a blast in driving simulator games!
